After using countless IDEs over my 20 years of professional web development and finally stumbling upon PhpStorm (JetBrains); I can say without hesitation, that this is my faavorite. The customizations, plugins, maintenanance/support, and utility that this offers helps me to be more efficient than ever! We develop Drupal (7, 8 and 9) applications for internal use and PHPStorm offers built-in and community support/plugins for not only Drupal, but CodeSniffer, XDebug, Composer, Git, and so many more. It's worth every penny and I highly recommend it.
